Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: "At the physical examination office, several people around Freeman's age are waiting for the results."}
{3: 'Amidst the silence, the only sound that breaks the stillness is the voice of the military staff as they call out names.'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Freeman.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Freeman rises from the chair and walks with a stiff gait toward the nearby office.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Please have a seat.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Freeman sits down, the staff member starts talking at a slow pace.'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "I'll tell you the conclusion first: your Tantalum affinity reaches the threshold.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Freeman's stiff body slightly relaxes upon hearing the news. This means, at the very least, neither he nor his sister will be forced to leave Babylonia."}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "Your affinity is very high, actually, so the military has a proposition for youâ€”we'd like you to join our adaptation experiment for specialized frames.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'If the experiment proves successful, you, equipped with a specialized frame, will have the opportunity to directly join an elite squad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Freeman', 3: 'Specialized frames... Like the ones Gray Raven has?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The staff member gives him a nod.'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "Sorry... I'm not interested in joining this program.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Freeman', 3: "Actually, what I'd like to join is... the Engineering Force.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Are you sure?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The staff member frowns at him.'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Based on your school records, the Task Force would be the ideal place for you to make the most of your expertise.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff Member', 3: "If you join the Engineering Force, you'll have to start everything over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Freeman', 3: "It's okay. I'd like it to be this way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff Member', 3: 'Can I ask about the reason?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Under the inquisitive gaze of the staff member, Freeman speaks his mind slowly yet resolutely as he recalls the concerned expression on Nina's face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Freeman', 3: "Because I don't want to die...", 4: '1'}
